hero.heading: A single home for businesses, permits, and compliance.
hero.description: This portal consolidates applications, staff reviews, tipline reports, and property assignments into a secure Supabase + Next.js stack. Phase 1 locks in our foundation so later phases can ship quickly without rewrites.

features.title: Regulations Library
features.description: Browse the compliance catalogue maintained by staff so your business always meets the latest policies.

features.title: Business Directory
features.description: See which entities are in good standing and reach their community and staffing resources in one spot.

features.title: Property Inventory
features.description: Track parcels that are available or pending assignment so proposals stay transparent and fair.

features.title: Compliance Tipline
features.description: Share leads or concerns with the compliance bureau. Anonymous submissions are welcome.
